tool_description: An API that shows all the latest Space News around the world
name: Space News
title: Space News

api_list.name: Get News from Specific Source
api_list.description: Gets News about Space from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://space-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://space-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "space-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Space News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Space
